Air Pollution: Studies Reveal Toxic Air is Taking Toll on Indians, Indian Government Denies
Air Pollution: Studies Reveal Toxic Air is Taking Toll on Indians, Indian Government Denies
Edited By
WION Video Desk
Published:
Dec 11, 2025, 13:49 IST
| Updated:
Dec 11, 2025, 13:49 IST
Global studies have found that toxic air pollution is having a severe toll on the health of Indians, with rising rates of respiratory diseases and other health issues linked to poor air quality. Despite mounting evidence, the Indian government has denied a direct link between air pollution and public health, stating that other factors play a more significant role.
